AESD-Course-Project

Course Project Documentation Page for UCB's AESD Sp `21

Sprint Overview

See the project’s Sprints page for progress updates, and the individual milestone for its breakdown.

Sprint’s Synopsis:

| Title | Description | Notes | | :— | :—- | :— | | ~Add Orientation~ | LIS2DH12 accelerometer X, Y, & Z feedback | done | | Add Motor Controls | PWM output control via an H-Bridge circuit | | | Add ADC | Microphone ADC sampling | | | Add DSP | Frequency generation and output & band-pass filtering of ADC samples | output done | | ~Add DAC~ | DAC output of scaled frequency samples | done | | Adjust Custom BLE GATT | Custom BLE GATT Services & Characteristics adaption of peripherals’ commands | | | Application | Application functionality merging all of the sub-modules (milestones) | |
